Article.Title: This Millennium Falcon Drone Can Make The Kessel Run In Less Than Twelve Parsecs
Article.Content: “What a piece of junk!” said Luke Skywalker. “She’ll make point five past lightspeed (30km/h.),” Han replied. “She may not look like much, but she’s got it where it counts, kid. I’ve made a lot of special modifications myself including a 1800mAh battery, a GoPro 3 and a handmade Styrofoam body shaped around beastly little drone.” The creator notes on Reddit that his next project is a remote controlled Tie Fighter, which should be perfect to defend Earth against the Klingons.
